pr_title: Add xpack.eql.enabled feature flag, disabled by default. Enabled for gradle run task and integration tests.

timeline.message: Add xpack.eql.enabled feature flag, disabled by default. Enabled for gradle run task and integration tests.
Add xpack.eql.enabled feature flag, disabled by default. Enabled for gradle run task and integration tests.

timeline.bodyText: We enable it here only for trial, but we run integration tests under basic. That doesn't seem to be consistent. I would just put next to pack.sql.enabled until we figure out what to do with it.
timeline.author: imotov

replies.bodyText: Updated to enable consistently with sql plugin for run task, seems logical.
replies.author: aleksmaus

timeline.message: Enable Eql feature flag for run task for all license types
Disable xpack.eql.enabled flag for all, except eql module integration tests
